preview_image.Creator: admin
preview_image.Description: The Image content type can be used to upload an image in various formats (JPG, GIF, PNG, SVG). The uploaded image should always have a high resolution so that it can be used flexibly, for example as a banner image. Plone automatically delivers the images in the best scaling, so there is no need to scale images down manually.

description: The Slider block allows you to add a slider to a page. A slider can display and tease multiple content on the website. Each piece of content is represented with an image containing the title, description and a button that leads to the linked content.
title: Slider
